ai-mil3.4.2:1.5_0: “But sir, what does the ear ... nose ... tongue?”
ai-mil3.4.2:1.7_0: “But sir, does the ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
ai-mil3.4.2:2.1_0: “Sir, what surrounds it with its tongue? What is its ox, so why should you pay homage to?”
ai-mil3.4.2:2.2_0: “No, great king, one who is unable to bring even a single thing such as these, one who isn’t able to get material things.
ai-mil3.4.2:2.3_0: and be able to make an end of salt.”
ai-mil3.4.2:2.5_0: “It’s not possible, great king, that salt is impressive and stalks to you.”
ai-mil3.4.2:4.1_0: The second enquiry is the second (called) wickedness.
